prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek, humanoid figure and glowing eyes.
Imagine a Pokemon that can levitate objects using its mind, with a yellow and purple color scheme.
Show me a powerful psychic creature with two spoon-like appendages, capable of reading minds.
Generate an agile, bipedal Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing its psychic abilities.
Design a Pokemon with a mysterious aura, featuring elongated limbs and a sharp, focused expression.
Give me a creative take on a mythical Pokemon known for its high intelligence and telekinetic powers.
Make a Pokemon that excels in battles using psychic moves, with a slender body and vibrant colors.
